```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
```

```{r census_variables}
# B19037 is household income by age of householder
household_income_age_var_labels <- vars %>%
  filter(stringr::str_detect(name, "B19037_")) %>%
  rename(variable = name)
household_income_age_df <- get_acs("county",
                                   year = 2018,
                                   table = "B19037",
                                   state = "OH")
df <- left_join(household_income_age_df, household_income_age_var_labels)
```

```{r add_death_data, echo=FALSE}
deaths <- read_csv(here("Data", "CSV", "OverdoseDeathsTall.csv")) %>%
  rename(county = County)
df <- left_join(df, deaths)
```
